subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Richard Hamilton scored 22 points, one of four Pistons with at least 17 last night, to lead Detroit to a 98-90 victory against the Orlando Magic and a 2-0 lead in their first-round series.
snippet: Richard Hamilton scored 22 points, one of four Pistons with at least 17 last night, to lead Detroit to a 98-90 victory against the Orlando Magic and a 2-0 lead in their first-round series.
